front.title: Decentralized Threat Signaling Protocol (DTSP) using OraSRS

abstract.t: This document specifies the Decentralized Threat Signaling Protocol (DTSP), a mechanism for distributed edge clients to collaboratively detect, report, and mitigate network threats. The protocol defines a state machine for threat lifecycle management (T0-T3), a standardized data format for threat signaling, and security mechanisms to prevent abuse in a permissionless environment.
